summary: A bodyslide/TBBP/HDT conversion of Nikitaa's push up Glass Armor replacer
descriptionHtml:
I use my own bodyslide files, and loved this armor... sooooo I converted it to bodyslide so I can use it with my body. 

Requires the original Pushup Glass replacer by Nikitaa, downloaded here:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11957/?

Thank you, Nikitaa, for this wonderful piece of work. I love you. <3

Known Issues: There may be some clipping with exceptionally large breasts.
author: Anatriax
